title: The Stripper Diaries
description: In the brutally raw The Stripper Diaries, author Trisha Paytas reveals a collection of her real life diary entries written during her stint as a Los Angeles stripper. A follow up to her wildly popular memoir, The History of My Insanity, this deeply personal collection gives readers a shocking glimpse into the dark side of an often glamorized industry.
author: Trisha Paytas
